attributes.action: police officers who commit crimes and abuse their power should be sacked from their jobs and prosecuted
attributes.additional_details: police officers who break the law should be sacked A new system should be set up to investigate officers as the police standards and the Ippc do nothing I have been waiting 2 years for the IPPC to investigate officers who beat up a 62 year old great grandmother who has never commited a crime does not drink or do drugs. with over a thousand convicted criminals 174 with serious violent offences including one of rape and over 20 thousand been disaplined for perverting the course of justice and have been reinstated back in to the police force how can we believe in a justice system that is so corrupt I want the goverment to take complaints against the police seriously.
